name: 2Sneaky4U
description:
You are a guard that ought to protect some hard drives with morally questionable information. But Sneaky Boy keeps sneaking in and grabbing them. Use your Special Lantern to see and capture him.
Sneaky Boy is trying to be sneaky and grab the hard drives, but he is so THICK, the clap of his butt cheeks keep alerting you.

This game was made by a team of 3 friends.
